quiz.text: WALRs stands for_________________________.
options: weighted average lending rates
weighted average leverage rates
weighted accumulated lending rates
weighted average lending ratios
weighted average liquidity rates

quiz.text: The two black swan events mentioned in RBI Annual report are __________________ ,and __________________________.
options: pandemic and monetary policies of the central banks
Pandemic and oil supply shocks
Sino-USA trade war and War in Ukraine
the Corona pandemic and the war in Ukraine
forex depletion, and war in Yemen

quiz.text: Aggregate supply, measured by gross value added (GVA) at basic prices, expanded by _________ % in 2022-23, as compared with a growth of _______________% in FY 2021-22.
options: 6.2, 8.2
6.4, 8.6
6.6, 8.8
6.8, 8.9
7.0, 9.0

quiz.text: Headline inflation increased to _________ per cent in 2022-23 from ____________per cent in 2021-22
options: 6.1, 5.1
6.3, 5.3
6.5, 5.5
6.7, 5.5
6.9, 5.9

quiz.text: The total value of coins in circulation increased by ________ in 2022-23, while the total volume increased by _________%
options: 8.1, 2.3
8.1, 2.6
8.2, 2.4
8.2, 2.6
8.3, 2.8

quiz.text: As per the RBI Annual Report for the FY 2022-23, the Balance Sheet total of RBI for the FY 2022-23 is ___________________.
options: 63,44,756 crore
64,90,302 crore
59,10, 312 crore
63, 90, 302 crore
42, 35,564 crore

quiz.text: As per RBI Annual Report 2022-23, the surplus payable by the RBI to the central government is__________________.
options: 10, 251 crore
15, 200 crore
30,307 crore
87,416 crore
90,000 crore

quiz.text: Mumbai interbank forward outright rate (MIFOR) has been replaced with______________.
options: Modified Mumbai interbank forward outright rate (MMIFOR)
Mumbai interbank forward outright Advanced rate (MIFOAR)
London Interbank Offered rate (LIBOR)
Financial Modified Interbank Forward Outright Rate(FMIFOR)
None of the above

quiz.text: Which department of the Reserve Bank of India is entrusted with the responsibility of managing the domestic debt of the Union, state, and two Union Territories of the Republic of India?
options: Corporate Strategy and Budget Department
Department of Government and Bank Accounts
Risk Monitoring Department
Internal Debt Management Department
Central Vigilance Cell

quiz.text: Which factor contributed to the growth of the Agriculture and Allied Activities sector in 2022-23 and what is the growth rate?
options: Abundance of sunlight, 3.1%
Government subsidies, 3.2%
Normal cumulative south-west monsoon rainfall, 3.3%
Decreased demand for agricultural products, 3.4%
Adoption of advanced farming technology, 3.5%

quiz.text: As of end-December 2022, there were _____________ financial literacy centers (FLCs) in the country. During 2022-23, a total of ____________ financial literacy activities were conducted by the FLCs up to December 31, 2022.
options: 1,478, 1,10,081
1,578, 1,30,081
1,678, 1,20,081
1,778, 1,10,081
1,478 , 1,15,081

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is true regarding the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) annual report.
options: The report is sent directly to the Union Finance minister under Section 53(2) of the RBI Act 1934 and through a letter of transmittal.
The report is published on the RBI's official website, under Section 53(1), and through a letter of transmittal.
The transmission of the report to the Union Finance secretary is done through a letter of transmittal, under Section 53(2), and not sent directly to the finance minister.
The report contains detailed information about the monetary policy of the government, under Section 53(2) and through a letter of transmittal.
The report is released quarterly, under Section 53(2) and through a letter of transmittal.

quiz.text: Consider the following statements. 1-The war in Ukraine. 2-Persistent elevation in food and energy inflation 3-The tightening of financial conditions in response to loose monetary policy tightening across the world Which among the following is not the reason/s for the weaker global economic growth?
options: 1 only
1 and 2
2 and 3
3 only
1 and 3

quiz.text: Consider the following statements in the context of the RBI Annual Report 2022-23 1- Headline inflation increased to 6.7% in 2022-23 from 5.5% in 2021-222- Indian economy is expected to have recorded a growth of 7.0% in real GDP in 2022-233- The gross fiscal deficit of the Union government declined from 6.75% of GDP in 2021-22 to 6.45% of GDP in 2022- 234- India’s merchandise exports touched US$ 450.4 billion during 2022- 23, which is 6.7% above the FY 2021-22.Which among the following statement/s is correct?
options: 1 Only
1 and 3
2, 3, and 4
1 and 4
All are correct

quiz.text: Consider the following statements in the context of Debt Management of the Central Government by the RBI. 1- During FY2022-23, the gross market borrowings of the Union government through dated G-secs were higher by 26.04% as compared with FY2021-22. 2- The central government started the year 2022-23 with a cash balance of Rs. 45,352 crore. 3- Short-term cash requirements of the central government are met through the issuance of Treasury Bills.Which among the following statement/s is /are incorrect?
options: 1 only
1 and 3
2 only
3 only
1 and 2

quiz.text: Consider the following statements in the context of Debt Management of State Governments 1- The share of market borrowings in financing the Gross Fiscal Deficit (GFD) of states rose to 78.1% in 2022-23 (BE) from 68.1% in 2021-22 (RE). 2- The weighted average cut-off yield (WAY) of SGSs issuances during 2022-23 was higher at 7.71% than 6.98% in the FY 2021-22. 3- The gross and net market borrowings of states were lower than the previous year Which among the following statement is correct?
options: 1 only
2 and 3
3 only
All are correct
None are correct

quiz.text: Which among the following option/s is correct?
options: Currency in circulation (CiC) includes banknotes, coins, and e₹.
In terms of Section 23A of the RBI Act, 1934, denominations as set out in Section 24 of the Act shall not apply to banknotes in digital form
The e₹-Retail has been launched in the whole India by the National Payments Corporation of India
The value and volume of banknotes in circulation increased by 4.4%, and 7.8 %, respectively, during 2022-23
In value terms, the share of 500 and 2000 banknotes together accounted for 89 % of the total value of banknotes in circulation as on March 31, 2023,

quiz.text: Consider the following statements. 1- RBI launched Pilot Project on QR Code-based Coin Vending Machine 2- A pilot Project on Mobile Coin Vans (MCVs) for the Distribution of Coins was launched 3- The total expenditure incurred on security printing during 2022-23 was Rs.4,682.80 crore as against Rs. 5,984.80 crore in the previous year. Which among the following statement/s is/are incorrect?
options: 1 only
1 and 2
2 only
2 and 3
3 only

quiz.text: Which option is incorrect in the context of Payments Vision 2025? 1- Payments Vision 2025 is built upon the six pillars 2- It was released with the core theme of e-Payments for Everyone, Everywhere and Every time 3- The last vision period was 2019-21.
options: 1 only
1 and 2
2 and 3
2 only
3 only

quiz.text: Consider the following statements  1- The RBI launched the Mission ‘Har Payment Digital’ on the occasion of the Digital Payments Awareness Week 2023 with the campaign theme “Digital Payment Apnao, Auron ko bhi Sikhao” 2- The RBI constructed a composite Digital Payments Index (DPI) in 2021 to capture the extent of digitization of payments across the country 3- PRAKALP stands for (Pratyaksh Kar Lekhankan Pranali) under Tax Information Network (TIN 3.0) Which among the following is incorrect?
options: 1 only
1 and 3
2 only
2 and 3
3 only

quiz.text: The FinTech Department, set up on January 4, 2022, is entrusted with the responsibility to give a further boost to the FinTech sector by fostering innovation, while remaining vigilant and addressing the risks associated with the FinTech ecosystem under the adequacy framework. In the same context, the Fintech Department has some agendas for FY2023-24. 1-Conducting further pilots with various use cases in both CBDC-Retail and CBDC-Wholesale (Utkarsh 1.0) 2- Conduct of global hackathons ‘HARBINGER’ series 3- Developing an appropriate framework for managing the FinTech ecosystem in the country (Utkarsh 1.0); Which among the following is not one of the agendas of the FinTech Department for the FY2023-24
options: 1 only
2 only
3 only
1 and 3
2 and 3

quiz.text: Consider the following statements in the context of RBI's Balance Sheet for the FY 2022-23. 1- National Rural Credit (Long term operations) fund is maintained by NABARD but the money is contributed by RBI 2- Employee cost for the FY 2022-23 is Rs. 6003.03 crore 3- On the assets side the value of notes issued is 33,48,238 crore. Which among the following is incorrect?
options: 1 only
2 and 3
3 only
1 and 3
1 and 2

quiz.text: Liberalized Remittances Scheme is implemented by which department of the RBI?
options: Financial Stability Department
International Department
Department of External Investments and Operations
Department of Currency Management
Foreign Exchange Department (FED)

quiz.text: Consider the following statements- 1- The implementation period of the National Strategy for Financial Inclusion (NSFI) is 2019-24 2- The implementation period of the National Strategy for Financial Education (NSFE) is 2020-25 3- National Centre for Financial Education has developed a financial education handbook for micro, small, and medium enterprises (MSMEs) Which among the following statement/s is incorrect?
options: 1 only
2 only
3 only
Only 1 and 2
All are correct

quiz.text: Which among the following option is incorrect?
options: The Scheduled commercial banks have disbursed loans and credit facilities amounting to 44.7% to the priority sectors as on March 31, 2023.
On a year-on-year basis, the outstanding credit to the MSMEs by Scheduled commercial banks increased by 14.2% during 2022-23
As of March 2023, 12 public sector and five private sector bank have been assigned lead bank responsibility
Providing banking access to every village within a 5-kilometer radius/hamlet of 600 households in hilly areas is one of the key objectives of the NSFI: 2019-2024.
The FI-Index comprises of three broad sub-indices (weights indicated in brackets), viz., access (35%), usage (45%), and quality (20%)

quiz.text: As per the Reserve Bank of India's Annual Report for the year 2022-23, the major driver/s of liquidity were? 1- Currency demand by the public, 2- volatile capital flows  3- swings in government cash balances
options: 1 only
1 and 2
2 only
2 and 3
All are correct

quiz.text: Consider the following statements in the context of capital expenditure as mentioned in the RBI's Annual report for the FY 2022-23 1- The capital expenditure is budgeted to increase by 37.4%. 2- Ministries of Road and Railways accounting for almost half of the budgeted capex 3- Capital outlay is budgeted to rise to 2.8% of GDP in 2023-24 (BE), the highest ever since independence of India. Which among the following statement/s is incorrect?
options: 1 only
1 and 2
2 only
3 only
All are correct

quiz.text: Which among the following option/s is correct as per the RBI's Annual; report for FY2022-23 ?
options: States and Union Territories (UTs) have budgeted for a consolidated GFD of 3.4% of GDP for 2022-23.
The Centre has put a limit to the state’s fiscal deficit at 3.5% of gross state domestic product (GSDP) for 2023-24,
Gross market borrowings for 2023-24 are pegged at Rs.15.43 lakh crore (5.1% of GDP) as against 14.21 lakh crore in 2022-23 RE (5.2% of GDP).
GST collections have been budgeted at 3.2% of GDP in 2023-24, the highest since the inception of GST.
All are correct

quiz.text: Consider the following options in the context of Digital Banking Units (DBUs).Which among the following option/s is incorrect?
options: There announcement was made in the Economic survey of 2021-22
At present, 84 DBUs are in operation
Banks are free to set up DBUs in accordance with regulatory guidance and policy
75 Digital Banking Units (DBUs) in 75 districts of the country to commemorate the 75 years of independence
The Hon’ble Finance Minister in her budget speech made the announcement on February 1, 2022, regarding the DBUs

quiz.text: Consider the following statements in the context of the Regulatory sandbox- 1- The Reserve Bank launched its first global hackathon HARBINGER 2022 in the year 2022 2- The second edition of Reserve Bank’s global hackathon – ‘HARBINGER 2023’ has also been launched with the theme ‘Inclusive Digital Services’ 3- For Harbinger 2023, innovative ideas have been invited for the four problem statements,  Which among the following statement/s is incorrect?
options: 1 only
2 only
1 and 3
2 and 3
All are correct
